data.englishTranslation: The thirst is gone, the veins are moistened and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
data.arabicVerse: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ، وَثَبَتَ الأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ

data.englishTranslation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
data.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka birahmatikal-latee wasi'at kulla shay'in 'an taghfira lee.
data.arabicVerse: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، أَنْ تَغْفِرَ لِي
